content: learn how to crochet this beautiful lightweight blanket it is worked in rounds from the centre out using simple stitches such as chain stitches single_crochet and double_crochet a free copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my ad supported blog https //richtexturescrochet com a free video tutorial can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level easy gauge 5 double_crochet sets x 6 row = 4 inches finished size 52 x 52 inches tall yarn 4 caron® cotton cakes™ 60% cotton 40% acrylic 8 8 oz / 250 g 530 yd / 485 m medium/worsted weight colour blue hawaiian hook h/8 5 00 mm crochet hook notions yarn needle
